## py3repl
A tool to mimic the python REPL

### Installation
```bash
pip install py3repl
```

### Usage
- Linux

    ```bash
    # call pyrepl from command-line

    pyrepl
    ```

- Windows

    ```bash
    # call pyrepl from command line
    pyrepl

    # if this failes, try
    python -m py3repl.pyrepl # this should work
    ```
